```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights)
```


## table3

```{r}
table3 %>%
  separate(..., into = c(..., ...), sep = "/")
```

```{r}
table3 %>%
  separate(..., into = c(..., ...), sep = "/") %>%
  ...(...)
```


## To table3

```{r}
table2 %>%
  ...(...) %>% 
  unite(..., ......., sep = "/")
```
